entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
